title: Expand Nigerian bank list for payout method selection

requirements.summary: Expand and improve the Nigerian bank/fintech options used by payout-method bank selection so users can choose major digital banks (Kuda, OPay, Moniepoint, PalmPay) in Withdrawals and Send-to-Bank flows.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/config/nigerianBanks.ts` includes entries for: "Kuda Bank", "OPay", "Moniepoint", and "PalmPay" (spelled as user-facing names).
The updated list remains the single source of truth used by `NigerianBankSelect`, and the new entries appear in bank search results when typing queries like "kuda", "opay", "monie", and "palm".

Users can successfully add a payout method selecting any of these new options from the searchable dropdown in both the Withdrawals flow and the Send-to-Bank sheet, with no UI crashes or validation dead-ends.

file_operations.description: Expand `NIGERIAN_BANKS` to include Nigerian digital banks/fintechs, explicitly adding "Kuda Bank", "OPay", "Moniepoint", and "PalmPay" as user-facing names; broaden the list with additional common online/digital options. Update `filterBanksByQuery` to use a more forgiving match (case-insensitive + normalized punctuation/whitespace) so queries like "kuda", "opay", "monie", and "palm" reliably surface the new entries while keeping this config as the single source of truth.

Add a focused unit test for `filterBanksByQuery` asserting that queries "kuda", "opay", "monie", and "palm" return results containing "Kuda Bank", "OPay", "Moniepoint", and "PalmPay", ensuring search behavior remains stable as the list grows.
